title: First family celebrates New Year
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The entire country is gripped in a happy and festive mood. The most eagerly awaited National New Year dawned at 1.01 pm on 14 April. This is the second National New Year the whole country is celebrating in an environment of peace and tranquility since…
